Best 39p i've ever spent! As others have said I entered an empty server but after a minute or two a few players joined and had a fun few games, loving the Quake One feel, all weapons and sound effects are pretty much spot on! It is sad that not many are playing the game as it is great fun, wish I had found this long ago!
Fantastic game. i love it. still got some players playing it.
Very good game on this game we can play for fun with friends or random person's
This game is severely underrated. It's basically Quake's multiplayer mode ported to the GoldSrc engine, and the big advantage of that besides slightly better graphics is simplified browser searching.

Deathmatch Classic is a simple but good game that you must try. Go into settings and turn on Raw Mouse Input in settings to fix the glitchy mouse. Servers are always empty so when it goes on sale gift this game to your friends which makes the game pretty fun. Muy divertido, un juego de la vieja escuela, aunque no hay casi nada de jugadores para jugarlo, puedes hacerlo con amigos  y pasar mas tiempo de diversion.

It's a cool combination between Quake and Half-Life, however, literally there are a total 12 server and absolutely nobody plays it, it's a shame cause it's a nice game, it takes you back to the late 1990's
Totally one of da best classics, pitty is dead but at least I found one server....with bots dayum

It's essentially Quake Deathmatch on Goldsrc with some elements from Half Life. Sadly there is a dead playerbase, Valve's other dead multiplayer title from the same era, RICOCHET. 

Player customization is good.
Controls can be customized.
Remaining active servers are both vanilla and modded.
Weapons and maps are great. 
Gameplay is smooth and fun.
Quick download.


Much like other titles, such as RICOCHET. I only recommend getting it via Valve Complete pack when that is on sale. Chances of playing with another player are low. I played for less than 30 minutes and encountered only one other player, he quit after a couple minutes. 

Such a shame this game is dead, back it was released it probably was a blast to play with other people at LAN parties and online. 

Despite the barren wasteland of empty servers, I recommend. Just make sure you acquire it via Valve Complete Pack when that goes on sale.

Pros

-It's pretty fun.

Con

-Nobody plays it.

I'd give it a "hey dude, check this cool game out."/10.
